attributes.comment:
Proposal: Please do not make I-485 fee increase applicable to all cases. Leave
the option open for individuals to file I-485 at current fee when they have additional
existing I-485 applications through which immigrations benefits such as Advance
Parole and employment authorization are already obtained.

Proposal for I-485 fee increase takes into account that the individual will possibly
seek immigration benefits such as I-131 or I-765 (EAD). A large number of
subjects might have existing I-485 petitions pending visa availability. Since
USCIS does not have a proper mechanism to allow interfiling of I-485 in case of
multiple I-140 approvals, it is appropriate to allow such individuals to file additional
I-485 at the existing, lower, fee.

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Srikanth Nallani
